author: aldo
body:
Carlo Mezzanotte:piano, keyboards, composition
Massimiliano Rosati: guitar (on "AZ" only)
Valerio Serangeli: bass, fretless bass, double bass
Stefano Pacioni: drums

Maurizio Giammarco: alto sax 
Umberto Fiorentino: guitar
Dario Deidda: bass on "Walking in your steps"
Liliana Gimenez: vocals on "La linea"

YVP 31292006

To purchase a copy online, please contact me. 
Here you'll find a worldwide list of distributors for the label.
For details on the music examples, and many more mp3s, please check the Music page.
title: La Linea
